## EditorPlugin interface

An Edtr.io plugin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EditorPlugin<S extends StateType = StateType, Config extends {} = {}>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                  | Type                                                                                                             | Description                                                                                                          |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Component](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.component.md) | React.ComponentType&lt;[EditorPluginProps](./internal__plugin.editorpluginprops.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, Config&gt;&gt; | React component that will be used to render the plugin. It accepts \[\[PluginEditorProps\]\] and <code>Props</code>. |
| [config](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.config.md)       | Config \| ((theme: Theme) =&gt; Config)                                                                          | Plugin configuration                                                                                                 |
| [state](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.state.md)         | S                                                                                                                | \[\[StateType\]\] of the plugin                                                                                      |

## Methods

| Method                                                                                               | Description                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [insertChild(state, { previousSibling, document, })](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.insertchild.md) | May be provided if the plugin is able to insert additional children                                                                                                                         |
| [isEmpty(state)](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.isempty.md)                                         | Will be used to decide if the plugin is empty (e.g. to decide whether we can safely delete the plugin). If not provided, we consider a plugin empty iff its state equals its initial state. |
| [onFiles(files)](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.onfiles.md)                                         | May be provided to let the plugin respond to file \[<code>paste</code> events\](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element/paste\_event) or drop events                             |
| [onKeyDown(e)](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.onkeydown.md)                                         | May be provided to prevent the default Edtr.io keyboard shortcuts                                                                                                                           |
| [onText(text)](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.ontext.md)                                            | May be provided to let the plugin respond to text \[<code>paste</code> events\](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element/paste\_event) or drop events                             |
| [removeChild(state, id)](./internal__plugin.editorplugin.removechild.md)                             | May be provided if the plugin is able to remove its child                                                                                                                                   |
